title: How to Make Gluten Free Potato Soup

steps.headline: In a large pot, add the diced potatoes, carrots, and celery.
steps.description: Add the chicken broth and just enough water to cover the vegetables.

steps.headline: Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer.
Cook the vegetables until very tender.
Pour the soup into a blender and blend until smooth.
steps.description: Add the milk, garlic, and salt and stir well.

steps.headline: Blend for 2 minutes.
steps.description: Pour the soup into the pot and heat well.

steps.headline: Serve warm or hot with parsley as a garnish.

text: In a large pot, add the diced potatoes, carrots, and celery. Add the chicken broth and just enough water to cover the vegetables. Bring the mixture to a boil, reduce the heat and simmer.  Cook the vegetables until very tender.  Pour the soup into a blender and blend until smooth. Add the milk, garlic, and salt and stir well. Blend for 2 minutes. Pour the soup into the pot and heat well. Serve warm or hot with parsley as a garnish.
